file_insights.file_purpose: Synthetic data generators for reproducible benchmarks

patterns_discovered: Deterministic random data generation using seeded RNG
Columnar data layout for OHLCV data
Geometric Brownian motion for price simulation
Configurable synthetic data generation with multiple parameters
Built-in data validation for generated series
gotchas_discovered: Using Box-Muller transform for generating standard normal distribution
Handling edge cases like zero-length series

key_achievements: Implemented OHLCV data generator with realistic constraints
Added NaN injection for sparse data testing
Developed utility functions for trend series generation

recommendations: Potentially add more configurability to data generators
Create unit tests to verify generator properties
Consider performance benchmarks for different RNG strategies
